title: Comedy Nights with Kapil - Jeetandra & Tusshar - 13th April
description:
Comedy Nights with Kapil - Jeetandra & Tusshar - 13th April HQ 480p [Desperadoz]
 <a href="
http://s10.postimg.org/tbjb82k9l/dsmrhvtyqg.png" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://s10.postimg.org/tbjb82k9l/dsmrhvtyqg.png</a>

The roller coaster ride of laughter starts with Kapil's usual one liners and wisecracks. Suddenly, Kapil's wife comes on stage asking for money to gift it to her friend on her marriage. Kapil refuses and starts insulting his wife, which has the audience in splits. After Kapil's wife leaves, Komal a personality developer, walks in and seeing her Kapil starts flirting with her. Komal asks him to call his family out. It is a laughter riot when Kapil's family steps out, along with Palak's mother, Pankhudi. Later, Jeetandra and Tusshar join Kapil on stage. Watch the show and have a blast. 

Renowned, actor-comedian Kapil Sharma makes his debut as a TV show producer with his new show Comedy Nights With Kapil. He will be seen multiple roles of an actor, scriptwriter and producer in his production debut. Already famous for his amazing comic timing and his talent to dig humor out of any situation, he is ready present everyday life in a fresh ad unique way.
